title: 3 Bedrooms NOW at Heritage Glen Townhomes!
posting_body: ['Hello!', 'My name is Marianne and I would love to help you with the application process to get you moved in as soon as we can!', 'Applications are $50 for each person over the age of 18.', 'Online application!!', '<URL>', 'Listed below are the current prices for both of our properties and highlighted the units we have coming available!', 'Westminster Park: Virtual tour available!!', '<URL>', '1 bedroom, 1 bath apt.', 'home-', '$950.00 - AVAILABLE IN SEPTEMBER', '2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1100 - AVAILABLE NOW', '3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome - $1375 AVAILABLE NOW', 'Heritage Glen: Virtual Tours Available!!', '<URL>', '• 1 bedroom, 1 bath townhome- $1025.00 AVAILABLE IN SEPTEMBER', '• 2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1150.00 AVAILABLE NOW', '• 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1275.00 - AVAILABLE IN NOW', '• 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1375.00 - AVAILABLE IN NOW', 'Gas, heat, and water are included', 'Qualifications:', 'To qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3x times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior money owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.', 'What to Bring When You Apply:', '- 4 most recent paystubs for each leaseholder', '- a copy of your social security card and ID (we need this for each person over 18)', '- Current Rent Receipts', '- Money order for application fee, this is $50.00 per adult (this is', 'nonrefundable)', 'If you have any questions, we are here Mon-Fri from 9a- 6p and Sat.', 'from 9am-4pm.', 'Marianne Snyder', 'Leasing Specialist', 'Heritage Glen Townhomes & Westminster Park Apartments', '9633 Pickwick Circle E. Taylor, MI 48180', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Fax:', 'show contact info']
